description:
A bunch of books recently have claimed Britain is a failed state. Sure, the Blob could do with a serious trim, says Joanna Gray. But in the most important ways, Britain is brilliant at tonnes of stuff.

The post Why Britain is Not a Failed State appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Why Britain is Not a Failed State

description:
A Republican congressman has called the U.S. Secret Service chief a "diversity hire" as he blamed a drive to recruit more female agents for security failings around the attempted assassination of Donald Trump.

The post “Diversity Hire” Secret Service Chief Blamed for Trump Shooting Security Failings appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: “Diversity Hire” Secret Service Chief Blamed for Trump Shooting Security Failings

description:
Immigration fuelled the biggest rise in the population in England and Wales for at least 75 years – almost 610,000 in a year – the ONS revealed today.

The post Immigration Fuels Biggest Population Rise in 75 Years appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Immigration Fuels Biggest Population Rise in 75 Years

description:
The worst political word of our time is ‘delivery’, says Prof James Alexander. It's on the lips of every politician, but this "Amazonisation" of politics completely misunderstands what politics is about.

The post The Worst Political Word is ‘Delivery’ appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The Worst Political Word is ‘Delivery’

description:
In recent weeks, Viktor Orbán has spoken to both Zelensky and Putin as part of a self-described "peace mission". For this, European leaders have denounced him and called for the removal of Hungary's voting rights.

The post Why Are European Leaders So Averse to Diplomacy? appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Why Are European Leaders So Averse to Diplomacy?

description:
French authorities have barred 3,570 individuals out of over 770,000 applicants for the upcoming Olympics, due to concerns over terror links and national security threats.

The post France Rejects 3,570 Olympics Jobseekers Over Terrorism Links and Other Risks to the Games appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: France Rejects 3,570 Olympics Jobseekers Over Terrorism Links and Other Risks to the Games

description:
The failed assassination of Trump represents a security failure by United States Secret Service that is so astounding, it will rightly inspire conspiracy theories for years to come, says Eugyppius.

The post A Failure of Secret Service Security So Astounding the Conspiracy Theories Write Themselves appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: A Failure of Secret Service Security So Astounding the Conspiracy Theories Write Themselves
